headerDisplay: IMPORTANT: The light must be added to Nature Remo as "Other" appliance. Native "Light" appliance is not supported.

name.title: Appliance Name
name.description: Name of the light appliance. Must match the name in Nature Remo app.

buttonName.title: Button Name
buttonName.description: Name of the light toggle button. Must match the name in Nature Remo app.

onToggleCount.title: ON Toggle Count
onToggleCount.description: Number of times to toggle the light switch to turn from OFF to ON

offToggleCount.title: OFF Toggle Count
offToggleCount.description: Number of times to toggle the light switch to turn ON to OFF

signalDelay.title: Delay between each toggle request to Nature Remo API (ms)

enableDummySettings.title: Enable dummy settings
enableDummySettings.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Enable brightness, color temperature, hue, and saturation settings. Does not actually send any signal to the light.
